TopicTitle: Planetary glitches/feature silly things or whatever

Articles.Content:
What is the biggest snowball you've ever made? You can answer with Kerbal Space, or real life.

...Okay, that's pretty impressive. You made that with your bare hands? Must have been cold. But let me show you mine...

![6ZhbfeI.png](http://i.imgur.com/6ZhbfeI.png)

> 
> Problems with RSS, can't get it to work, so now I'm left with the giant snowball in all of it's majesty

Whoa! That's pretty crazy, right? Made it myself.

So, this giant snowball thing wanted me to make a thread spreading it's presence throughout all the forums, and also demanded that I ask this question:

What are some crazy things that ever happened to you like this? Have you ever had a snowball this huge? OoOoO! Maybe we can make planetary snowmen!

I feel like this should have it's own legacy. Let's see, there's the Kraken, the Magic Boulder, the mysterious billboard out on the Mun, the KSC II, the Mohole, and a few others I didn't listforgot about. The NaNo virus is my own thing it seems. How about "Ice Age Kerbin?"
That happened to me when I tried to install RSS in 1.0.2 lol.
That's far worse than an Ice Age Kerbin, that's a 'Snowball Earth' Kerbin.

> 
> That's far worse than an Ice Age Kerbin, that's a 'Snowball Earth' Kerbin.

But... Which one is it?

> 
> That happened to me when I tried to install **64k** in 1.0.2 lol.

Fixed to suit my needs.

But look on the bright side, Eeloo finally got a soulmate.

I'm being punished by the giant snowball!

![DME9Mp0.png](http://i.imgur.com/DME9Mp0.png)

What did I do wrong!? Mr. NaN, you too!?

I think I've killed the game with RSS. I wont be able to play it until the next update.

> 
> I'm being punished by the giant snowball!
> [http://i.imgur.com/DME9Mp0.png](http://i.imgur.com/DME9Mp0.png)
> 
> What did I do wrong!? Mr. NaN, you too!?
> 
> I think I've killed the game with RSS. I wont be able to play it until the next update.

That same glitch with the part menu happened to me, and I could place Kerbals in the VAB! They'd go flying off with lights on, and I could also place flags!

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122876-Weird-Glitch-Something-Funny?highlight=Weird+Glitch%2FSomething+funny](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122876-Weird-Glitch-Something-Funny?highlight=Weird+Glitch%2FSomething+funny)

Also, what billboard on the Mun? I've never heard about it.
You also got attacked by Mr. NaN? There's gonna be no stopping it.
Did you install the RSS textures?

An ice age Kerbin makes sense when you think about it. Population gone, last few trying to find a new home, last industries space prioritised.

Kerbin would be a lot more boring.

> 
> Did you install the RSS textures?

Yes. It just refused for some reason.
Mine actually happened after I reverted to VAB. Maybe I do that to much.... ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
